## Profile/Citation

Nura Waziri is a Certified Virtual Reality Developer, Oracle Certified Administrator, Cisco Certified Network Associate, Certified Ethical Hacker, and a Certified Machine Learning Engineer. He currently serves as the Head of Innovation and Research & Development in the Digital Health Department of Aminu Kano Teaching Hospital, where he leads the integration of emerging technologies such as XR and AI into healthcare solutions.

Nura is also the Director of Research and Technology at Pentest Cyber Security Institute, CEO of MyLife@360, and Head of IT at iDevPro Africa, demonstrating a deep commitment to driving digital innovation across multiple sectors. With a strong foundation in cybersecurity, extended reality, and AI, Nura brings a unique, forward-thinking perspective to the intersection of healthcare, education, and technology.
